definition: The term "knusprig" refers to a desirable texture or quality of certain food items. It describes the characteristic of being crispy, crunchy, or having a pleasant crunch when bitten into. This word is commonly used to describe various types of baked goods, such as bread, pastries, or cookies, as well as fried or roasted dishes. It is often used to indicate the desired texture or level of crispiness in culinary contexts.

examples.english: The chicken drumsticks are crispy fried.

examples.german: Die Kekse sind knusprig und lecker.
examples.english: The cookies are crispy and delicious.

examples.german: Die Pizza hat einen knusprigen Rand.
examples.english: The pizza has a crispy crust.
